title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Security and encryption, Electronic payment systems, Search engines, Intelligent agents in E-Commerce, On-line auctions, Data mining for e-commerce, Web metrics, Recommender systems, Knowledge management, Mobile e-commerce, Legal, ethical and social issues.
